Query.name: NO2_UnhealthyForSensitiveGroups_s
Query.text: from NO2_Avg_s [value >= 101.0 and value <361.0] select timestamp, stationId, 3 as levelNumber, ‘NO2_UnhealthyForSensitiveGroups’ as levelName insert into PollutantLevel;

Query.name: NO2_Moderate_s
Query.text: from NO2_Avg_s [value >= 54.0 and value < 101.0] select timestamp, stationId, 2 as levelNumber, 'NO2_Moderate' as levelName insert into PollutantLevel;

Query.name: NO2_Hazardous_s
Query.text: from NO2_Avg_s [value >= 1250.0 and value < 2049.0] select timestamp, stationId, 6 as levelNumber, 'NO2_Hazardous' as levelName insert into PollutantLevel;

Query.name: NO2_VeryUnhealthy_s
Query.text: from NO2_Avg_s [value >= 650.0 and value < 1250.0] select timestamp, stationId, 5 as levelNumber, 'NO2_VeryUnhealthy' as levelName insert into PollutantLevel;

Query.name: NO2_Unhealthy_s
Query.text: from NO2_Avg_s [value >= 361.0 and value < 650.0] select timestamp, stationId, 4 as levelNumber, 'NO2_Unhealthy' as levelName insert into PollutantLevel;

Query.name: AirQualityLevel_s
Query.text: from PollutantLevel.win:time_batch[5 minutes] group by stationId select timestamp, stationId, max(levelNumber) as level insert into AirQualityLevel;

Query.name: NO2_Avg_s
Query.text: from AirMeasurement.win:time[1 hour] group by stationId select stationTs as timestamp, stationId, avg(no2) as value insert into NO2_Avg;

Query.name: NO2_Good_s
Query.text: from NO2_Avg_s [value >= 0.0 and value < 54.0] select timestamp, stationId, 1 as levelNumber, 'NO2_Good' as levelName insert into PollutantLevel;
